CustomField.description: Composed by Area + "JHA" + Foreman's first and last names + mmddyyyy + end time(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: Form__r.Area_Code__c + " " + 'JHA' + " - " + CreatedBy.FirstName + " " + CreatedBy.LastName + " " + TEXT(Start_Date__c) + " " + IF ( CONTAINS ( MID ( End_Time__c, FIND ( ":", End_Time__c ) + 1, 2 ), ":" ), "0" + MID ( End_Time__c, FIND ( ":", End_Time__c ) + 1, 1 ), MID ( End_Time__c, FIND ( ":", End_Time__c ) + 1, 2 ) )
CustomField.label: PDF Name
